title: Parasite Turns Bees Into Zombie-Like Creatures
teaser: Biologists are reporting signs of a possible zombie apocalypse. Well, at least for the honeybee population. A parasite that has been turning bees on the West Coast into zombie-like creatures has started infecting bees in the East, and biologists are still puzzled as to how it all works.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
